page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT. People living in this area mostly work in other parts of Belfast. There are a few people who work in this area.Some people, for example are teachers.They teach in "Littleflower, St. Therese,Fort-William and Bearnageeha schools." Some people are doctors,dentists,priests,shopkeepers, police,lolly pop men,care takers, dinner ladies and bank employees are the main people working in the district.There are no major indusries or factories in the district.The majority of people living here travel to work by bus and car each day.Traffic into Belfast is particularly heavy between the hours of 8 a.m. to 9 a.m. This is because many commuters are travelling to their place of work.Between 5 p.m. to 6 p.m. most people return home from work.
